links.title: Apple iOS 11.2.6 Has A Significant Problem
links.description: iOS 11.2.6 is more controversial than it should be. On the surface, it's a seemingly simple bug fix , but it contains enough problems ( the biggest is truly bizarre ) that warned users not to upgrade. Now a new problem illustrates exactly why the cautious approach was best...

links.title: BlackBerry sues Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram over patent infringement
links.description: (Reuters) - BlackBerry Ltd () on Tuesday filed a patent infringement lawsuit against Facebook Inc () and its WhatsApp and Instagram apps, arguing that they copied technology and features from BlackBerry Messenger. Litigation over patent infringement is part of BlackBerry Chief Executive John Chen's strategy for making money for the company, which has lost market share in the smartphone market it once dominated.
